content.rendered:
THE POLKA DOT TREND

Eyelash Extensions may not be a thing of the past since our national Stay at home act.  I’m starting this week with hopeful/positive thoughts…. and Spring trends. I know this a stressful and difficult time for everyone during coronavirus, but we can all take a few moments to enjoy something fun and relaxing. I’m focusing on (even if just for a few minutes) on the polka dot trend.

When Spring arrives we all love to wear flower patterns, brighter colors, and add the always classic polka dot look. This season, this classic trend gets an upgrade with a modern ’80s twist with bold shoulders and contemporary silhouettes. I’m loving all-white with small black polka dots dresses, tops, and even pants. 

Another way to incorporate the polka dot trend is with accessories like a bold shoe with jeans or a bag like the top YSL bag…not exactly polka dots but still a cool ’80s pattern. I hope you have some fun with this trend this Spring mixing and matching with denim or wearing it as a bold evening dress. 

Both looks are from FWRD.COM. All three earrings are from FWRD as well. The bottom black and white earrings are Lele Sadoughi. The top leather bag is from YSL, the middle shoes are from Alexandre Vauthier, and the polka dot clutch is from Comme Des Garcons. And we can’t forget the lashes! If you don’t have time to stop by the lash salon you can always order D’Lashes online.

Wishing you all tons of love and safety!

XO XO, Dionne 

P.S. Did you book your lash extensions appointment yet? For appointments – Click Here (By Appointment Only). Shop D’Lashes Beauty, Candles, and A-List Strip Lashes Here.
